00037 #define IMPL_CONVERT(SRC,DST,SRC_KEY,DST_KEY)                                           \
00038     template<> void numeric_convert_impl<SRC,DST>( const SRC *src, DST *dst, size_t count ){\
00039         LOG( Runtime, info )                                                                    \
00040                 << "using optimized convert " << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName() << " => "               \
00041                 << ValuePtr<DST>::staticName() << " without scaling";                                \
00042         oil_conv_ ## DST_KEY ## _ ## SRC_KEY (dst,sizeof(DST),src,sizeof(SRC),count);       \
00043     }
00044 
00045 #define IMPL_SCALED_CONVERT(SRC,DST,SRC_KEY,DST_KEY)                                                                 \
00046     template<> void numeric_convert_impl<SRC,DST>( const SRC *src, DST *dst, size_t count, double scale, double offset ){\
00047         LOG( Runtime, info )                                                                                             \
00048                 << "using optimized scaling convert " << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName() << "=>" << ValuePtr<DST>::staticName()    \
00049                 << " with scale/offset " << std::fixed << scale << "/" << offset;                                            \
00050         oil_scaleconv_ ## DST_KEY ## _ ## SRC_KEY (dst,src,count,&offset,&scale);                                        \
00051     }
00052
